channel.title: BlitzAnalysiz[] on Home
channel.description: Recent content in BlitzAnalysiz[] on Home

item.title: Blitz Updates
item.description: Update 10.1 Update 10.0 Update 9.8 Update 9.7 Update 9.6 Update 9.5 Update 9.0 Note The statistics are being updated at the end of every update so those lag behind one update.

item.title: Blog
item.description: BlitzAnalysiz.com launchedHy! BlitzAnalysiz.com is a site about in-depth game statistics of Wargaming’s World of Tanks Blitz. You won’t find individial player statistics here - for those, please check awesome Blitzstars.

item.title: Changelog
item.description: 2023-03-25 Fix missing Chinese Light tanks (WZ-132-1) Fix misc bugs in calculations impacting update 9.6 stats too 2023-03-22 Added stats for update 9.7. The site tracks now nearly every active Blitz player.

item.title: TODO
item.description: This is a non-comprehensive list of things I plan to work on when I have time. Stratified sampling for Relative WR analysis to further eliminate the impact of different player populations to measure.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: 1. Where is the data from All the data has been collected from Wargaming API and processed with R/RStudio. 2. Are your numbers correct? Is there bias in the numbers? The statistics have been calculated from a data set with very high number of players (700,000+) and battles (in total 6bn+).

item.title: About
item.description: BlitzAnalysiz[] is a site about in-depth game statistics of Wargaming’s World of Tanks Blitz World war II-themed multiplayer online tank game. You won’t find individial player statistics here - for those, please check awesome Blitzstars.
